mapper.select: select i.apartmentName as apartmentName, d.floor as floor, d.area as area, i.dong as dong , d.dealamount as dealamount, i.roadName as roadName, i.roadNameBonbun as bonbun, i.lng as lng, i.lat as lat from housedeal as d join houseinfo as i on d.aptcode = i.aptCode where i.dongCode = #{regCode} and d.dealYear = ${year} and d.dealMonth = ${month} limit 30
mapper.insert: insert into favorite(user_id, houseinfo_aptCode, dongCode) values(#{id}, concat(left(#{dongCode},5),'000000001') ,#{dongCode})
mapper.delete: delete from favorite where user_id = #{id} and dongCode = #{dongCode};
mapper.select: select i.apartmentName as apartmentName, d.floor as floor, d.area as area, i.dong as dong , d.dealamount as dealamount, i.roadName as roadName, i.roadNameBonbun as bonbun, i.lng as lng, i.lat as lat from housedeal as d join houseinfo as i on d.aptcode = i.aptCode where i.dongCode in (select distinct dongCode from favorite where user_id = #{id}) limit 30

select b.bus_name, b.gps_lati, b.gps_long from bus b where (6371*ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{lat}))*COS(RADIANS(b.gps_lati))*COS(radians(b.gps_long)-RADIANS(#{lng}))+SIN(RADIANS(#{lat}))*SIN(RADIANS(b.gps_lati)))) < 2.0 order by (6371*ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{lat}))*COS(RADIANS(gps_lati))*COS(radians(gps_long)-RADIANS(#{lng}))+SIN(RADIANS(#{lat}))*SIN(RADIANS(gps_lati))))

select distinct i.apartmentName, i.lat, i.lng from housedeal as d join houseinfo as i on d.aptcode = i.aptCode where (6371*ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{lat}))*COS(RADIANS(i.lat))*COS(radians(i.lng)-RADIANS(#{lng}))+SIN(RADIANS(#{lat}))*SIN(RADIANS(i.lat)))) < 3.0;

select i.apartmentName as apartmentName, d.floor as floor, d.area as area, i.dong as dong, d.dealamount as dealamount, i.roadName as roadName, i.roadNameBonbun as bonbun, i.lng as lng, i.lat as lat from housedeal as d join houseinfo as i on d.aptcode = i.aptCode where (6371*ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{lat}))*COS(RADIANS(i.lat))*COS(radians(i.lng)-RADIANS(#{lng}))+SIN(RADIANS(#{lat}))*SIN(RADIANS(i.lat)))) < 3.0 and i.apartmentName = #{apartmentName} and i.lat = #{lat} and i.lng = #{lng};

select i.apartmentName as apartmentName, d.floor as floor, d.area as area, i.dong as dong, d.dealamount as dealamount, i.roadName as roadName, i.roadNameBonbun as bonbun, i.lng as lng, i.lat as lat, d.dealYear as dealYear from housedeal as d join houseinfo as i on d.aptcode = i.aptCode where i.dongCode = #{dongCode}

select i.apartmentName as apartmentName, d.floor as floor, d.area as area, i.dong as dong , d.dealamount as dealamount, i.roadName as roadName, i.roadNameBonbun as bonbun, i.lng as lng, i.lat as lat, d.dealYear, d.dealMonth, d.dealDay, i.dongCode from housedeal as d join houseinfo as i on d.aptcode = i.aptCode where i.dongCode = #{dongCode} order by d.dealYear desc, d.dealMonth desc, d.dealDay desc limit 3;

select school_id schoolId, school_name schoolName, school_level schoolLevel, address_jibun addressJibun, address_doro addressDoro, gps_lati gpsLati, gps_long gpsLong from school where (6371*ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{lat}))*COS(RADIANS(gps_lati))*COS(radians(gps_long)-RADIANS(#{lng}))+SIN(RADIANS(#{lat}))*SIN(RADIANS(gps_lati)))) < 1.0 order by (6371*ACOS(COS(RADIANS(#{lat}))*COS(RADIANS(gps_lati))*COS(radians(gps_long)-RADIANS(#{lng}))+SIN(RADIANS(#{lat}))*SIN(RADIANS(gps_lati))))
